name: Citrus Lip Balm (for winter)
description:
This lip balm is great for soothing chapped lips during wintertime. The lemon essential oil is fresh and will help keep coldsores (and the flu) away! 

    * Suitable for vegans
    * Protects, moisturises, softens and nourishes your lips
    * Guards against dryness and cracking
    * Helps heal damaged lips
    * Acts as a barrier to protect against environmental damage

Ingredients: beeswax, sweet almond oil, calendula oil, lemon essential oil. (that's it! No nasties!)

This item is label-free so you can re-use the tin! 
Not tested on animals, Home made in Australia!

Lemon essential oil can sometimes irritate the skin when exposed to UV rays so avoid using it for at least 12hours before sunbathing or using a sunbed. In the rare event of an adverse reaction discontinue use.

name: Winter Moisturiser
description:
This winter moisturiser is warming and soothing. The lemon essential oil will help keep coldsores (and the flu) away. This moisturiser can also double as a lightweight lip balm.

    * Suitable for vegans
    * Protects, moisturises, softens and nourishes skin

Ingredients: Sweet Almond Oil, Avocado Oil, Beeswax, Water, Lemon Essential Oil, Geraneum Essential Oil, Preservative (Phenoxyethanol).

This item is label-free so you can re-use the tin! 
Not tested on animals, Home made in Australia!

Lemon essential oil can sometimes irritate the skin when exposed to UV rays so avoid using it for at least 12hours before sunbathing or using a sunbed. In the rare event of an adverse reaction discontinue use.

name: Healing cream (for stretchmarks and scars)
description:
This cream (we've nicknamed it 'stretchmark porridge') smells absolutely amazing. Use it everywhere you have scars or stretch marks. Great for expectant mums, use all over the tummy!

    * Suitable for vegans
    * Protects, moisturises, softens and helps skin heal
    * Evening Primrose Oil alleviates skin conditions and
       pre-mentrual symptoms.
    * Acts as a barrier to protect against environmental damage

Contains: Beeswax, Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Evening Primrose Oil, Spring Water, Ylang Ylang, Lavender Essential Oil, Lemon Essential Oil, Preservative (Phenoxyethanol).

This item is label-free so you can re-use the tin! 
Not tested on animals, Home made in Australia!

Lemon essential oil can sometimes irritate the skin when exposed to UV rays so avoid using it for at least 12hours before sunbathing or using a sunbed. In the rare event of an adverse reaction discontinue use.

name: Massage Oil
description:
This massage oil smells fresh and sugary. It keeps the skin nice and silky without feeling too oily and makes massages feel amazing!

    * Suitable for vegans
    * Not gross and oily like other massage oils.

Ingredients: Sweet Almond Oil, Grapefruit Essential Oil,  Mandarin Essential Oil, Lavender Essential Oil (that's it! No nasties!)

Not tested on animals, Home made in Australia.
Intentionally label-free so you can re-use the bottle!
